verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Down at Your feet, O Lord, Is the most high place. In Your presence, Lord, I seek Your face, I seek Your face. (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is no higher calling, No greater honor, Than to bow and kneel before Your throne. Iâ€™m amazed at Your glory, Embraced by Your mercy, O Lord, I live to worship You. (repeat){/lang-eng}
